text: Frederik Arnoldus Flinkevleugel (3 November 1939 â€“ 10 April 2020) was a Dutch footballer who played as a right back. He was born in Amsterdam. Flinkevleugel played for DWS and FC Amsterdam. He played for the national team from 1964 to 1967. Flinkevleugel died of COVID-19 on 10 April 2020 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands Category:Footballers from Amsterdam
title: Frits Flinkevleugel
